function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerability of certain groups to mental health disturbances during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of stress, anxiety, and depression in vulnerable groups.","Mitigation":"Developing tailored programs to address the specific needs of vulnerable groups.","Technologies":"Mental health support platforms, telemedicine, online counseling services.","People":"Females, young age, unemployed individuals, individuals with previous mental health conditions.","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals, government agencies."},{"Description":"Reliance on unreliable or overwhelming information sources for pandemic-related information dissemination.","Impact":"Increased risk of misinformation and mental health disturbances due to unreliable information sources.","Mitigation":"Using reliable and trustworthy sources for information dissemination, providing clear and accurate information.","Technologies":"Information verification tools, official government communication platforms, fact-checking services.","People":"General public, government organizations, health authorities.","Owner":"Media organizations, government agencies, health communication professionals."},{"Description":"Prevalence of psychological problems and associated factors during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Increased psychological problems such as depression, anxiety, and stress in the population.","Mitigation":"Implementation of mental health support programs, identification of associated risk factors, and targeted interventions.","Technologies":"Mental health assessment tools, telemedicine, remote therapy platforms.","People":"General population.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals, government agencies."}]}
